title: Ticket #6948: Value of Concurrency Limits no longer reported in userprio ad
description:
condor_userprio -negotiator -l used to emit the current values of the ConcurrencyLimits. Although this was undocumented, it was removed when the accountant ads were moved to the collector. Let's restore this functionality.

In the long run, we'd like to put the the concurrency limits information in the collector, but in what table? Do we really need a new ad type just for these? Should they go into the negotiator ad?
remarks:
2019-Mar-26 16:14:54 by johnkn:
CODE_REVIEW: change looks good. version history needed.
